name: master-os-ai
description: This is going to be an ambitious project

scripts.dev:without_rust: concurrently -n "FRONTEND,BACKEND,ELECTRON" -c "green,blue,magenta" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:electron"
scripts.dev: concurrently -n "FRONTEND,BACKEND,ELECTRON,RUST" -c "green,blue,magenta,yellow" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:electron" "npm run dev:rust"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:rust && npm run build:electron
scripts.package:win: npm run build && cd electron && npm run package -- --win
scripts.package:mac: npm run build && cd electron && npm run package -- --mac
scripts.package:linux: npm run build && cd electron && npm run package -- --linux

author: Badsha Laskar
